QuestData.Title: Crying Violet
QuestData.Description: We must prepare carefully before assaulting Jaedenar. The magic of the warlocks and demons within Jaedenar is strong, and we will need wards of our own before entering.$B$BWe need only one more ingredient: Crying Violet, which grows in the hills near the enemy's stronghold to the northwest. $B$BGather the crying violet, then meet my assistant in the field. He will know what to do next.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you found the crying violet yet, $n? We need them quickly.
QuestData.RewardText: Wonderful. Greta chose wisely when she asked you to perform this task. I will work the herbs immediately...
